Vapour pressure¶

fit_ant(Texp, Pexp, x0=[0, 0, 0])[source]¶

fit_ant fit Antoine parameters, base exp

Parameters:
  • Texp (experimental temperature in K.) –
  • Pexp (experimental pressure in bar.) –
  • x0 (array_like, optional) – initial values.
Returns:

fit – Result of SciPy minimize
Return type:

OptimizeResult
fit_ksv(component, Texp, Pexp, ksv0=[1, 0])[source]¶

fit_ksv fit PRSV alpha

Parameters:

  • Pexp (array_like) – experimental pressure in bar.
